Uses of Package
aprove.Framework.IntTRS.Nonterm.GeoNonTerm

  • Packages that use aprove.Framework.IntTRS.Nonterm.GeoNonTerm 
    Package Description
    aprove.Framework.IntTRS.Nonterm.GeoNonTerm  
  • Classes in aprove.Framework.IntTRS.Nonterm.GeoNonTerm used by aprove.Framework.IntTRS.Nonterm.GeoNonTerm 
    Class and Description
    GeoNonTermArgument
    This class represents a Geometric Non-Termination Argument (GNA).
    GNAMatrix
    Represents a int-matrix and a labeling to the rows and columns.
    GNAVariableVector
    This Class defines a vector similar to the GNAVector, with the difference, that this vector can contain variables within the vector.
    GNAVector
    the GNAVector is an extension of the VecInt.
    Logger 
    Loop
    This class is the representative of the LOOP-matrices used for the Geometric Non-Termination Analysis.
    SMTFactory
    The SMTFactory contains the functions and instances that are necessary to derive a GeoNonTermArgument within the GeoNonTermAnalysis.
    Stem
    This class is the representative of the STEM-vector used for the Geometric Non-Termination Analysis.
